SpaceInvaders.Objects

Class SpaceShip

  • java.lang.Object
    • SpaceInvaders.Objects.SpaceObject
      • SpaceInvaders.Objects.SpaceShip
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Drawable, Movable

    public class SpaceShip
extends SpaceObject
    SpaceShip extends Object class. Represents the space ship, controlled by the user.
    Author:
    Jose Miguel Melo & Ricardo Loureiro
